subject: Special offer from our store
body:
Dear valued member.
With this special pharmaceutical bulletin we introduce MyCanadianPharmacy providing high quality products at low cost.
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Buy Canadian products manufactured according to the same strict medical standards followed in the United States.
Just click herehttp://spreadown.hk
Safety, confidentiality of your information and secure purchasing guaranteed.Spring discounts for all the customers.
Sincerely yours,Stacy Bryan
